text: Joe is a 1970 American drama movie directed by John G. Avildsen and starring Susan Sarandon, Peter Boyle, Dennis Patrick, K Callan. It was distributed by Cannon Group and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1971. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by John G. Avildsen Category:American independent movies
title: Joe (movie)
